sentence.Network_en: Her kidnapper successfully extorted a £75,000 ransom for her release.
sentence.Network_cn: 绑匪成功地勒索了7.5万英镑才将她释放。

sentence.Network_en: The BBC has just successfully demonstrated a new digital radio transmission system.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国广播公司刚刚成功地演示了一套新的数字无线电传输系统。

sentence.Network_en: Successfully merging two banks requires a fast and ruthless attack on costs.
sentence.Network_cn: 成功合并两家银行需要坚决快速地着手解决费用问题。

entry.tran: 达到目的的;有成效的;成功的
entry.def: Something that is successful achieves what it was intended to achieve. Someone who is successful achieves what they intended to achieve.

example.ex: How successful will this new treatment be?...
example.tran: 这一新的疗法会有多大成效？

example.ex: I am looking forward to a long and successful partnership with him...
example.tran: 我期盼着能与他建立长期而有成效的合作关系。

entry.tran: 获得成功的;受欢迎的;获利匪浅的
entry.def: Something that is successful is popular or makes a lot of money.

example.ex: ...the hugely successful movie that brought Robert Redford an Oscar for his directing...
example.tran: 让罗伯特·雷德福拿到了奥斯卡最佳导演奖的大受欢迎的影片

example.ex: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
example.tran: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

entry.def: Someone who is successful achieves a high position in what they do, for example in business or politics.

example.ex: Women do not necessarily have to imitate men to be successful in business...
example.tran: 女性不见得非要模仿男性才能在商界叱咤风云。

auth_sentence.content: The company successfully curtailed its costs to boost margins.
auth_sentence.res_content: The company successfully curtailed its costs to boost margins.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The company successfully curtailed its costs to boost margins.

auth_sentence.content: However, many dystonic conditions can be successfully managed.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, many dystonic conditions can be successfully managed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, many dystonic conditions can be successfully managed.

auth_sentence.content: He can use brain more successfully than unintelligent man.
auth_sentence.res_content: He can use brain more successfully than unintelligent man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He can use brain more successfully than unintelligent man.

Sentence.sentence: In contrast," the researchers continue, "many regulations that don't assume people make rational choices have been successfully applied to control alcohol, a substance — like food — of which immoderate consumption leads to serious health problems.
It ensures that students' expectations are successfully fulfilled.

The technology has been successfully applied overseas, but the only other public robotic garage in the United States has been troublesome, dropping vehicles and trapping cars because of technical problems.
There is no chance that will change anytime soon, even if the government creates a better social safety net and successfully encourages greater consumer spending.
He has been successfully elected Prime Minister.

sentences.en: Many women successfully mix marriage and career.
sentences.cn: 许多女人能成功地将婚姻和事业结合起来。

sentences.en: I managed to negotiate successfully with the authorities.
sentences.cn: 我设法同当局进行了成功的协商。

sentences.en: Last October the first batch of low-alloy channel steel was successfully rolled.
sentences.cn: 去年10月,成功轧出第一批低合金槽钢。

sentences.en: Local people have successfully campaigned against the building.
sentences.cn: 当地人成功争取阻止了兴建这一建筑。
